input.sentences: i was busy making a lot of food for my friends .
they were on the balcony smoking and drinking .
they were waiting a long time for me to finish .
when i was finally done i served the food .
output.sentences: I made a lot of food for my friends.
While I was cooking, they were smoking and drinking on the balcony.
Some of the girls were just killing time and waiting for the food to finish.
The food was finally done and I served everyone individually.
Afterward, everyone was so full they could hardly move.
